Different Crime.Crime Name: Inadmissibility to Canada pursuant to paragraph 34(1)(f) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
legal_basis: paragraph 34(1)(f) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
evidence_assessment: officer concluded MQM-A was a terrorist organization without clear reasoning or credible evidence
analysis lacked specifics on acts meeting the legal definition of terrorism
decision_outcome: case remitted for reconsideration by another officer

Different Crime.Crime Name: Membership in an organization engaging in terrorist activities
